subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Tomas Berdych won the Japan Open for his first singles title in 16 months, beating Juan Martín del Potro, 6-1, 6-4, in Tokyo. The ninth-seeded Berdych relied on strong serves and solid ground strokes to beat del Potro, who won 29 of 30 matches going into the final.
